title: OOL Team Asylum LF Players
body:
After the last weekend of OOL we have not had a solid roster, given the amount of time to the finals I am hoping to put together a roster of players that will be able to find synergy quickly and play with a chance at competing for one of the top 2 spots. Players will need to be diamond 4 or above and be able to play ~6-10pm (AEST) each night as well as be available on the weekend for the OOL tournament.

All roles are welcome to trial, and in the applicable cases will be trialing against the current roster members of the team.
Please add me in game (ign): Powpowpanda
